pages.text: Starmetal is a rare material created deep in the earth. It is a foundational block for many magical components.

Starmetal ore should generate deep underground. Due to a number of interesting magical confluxes, it does not. However, it can be created from iron ore via a simple process involving the sheer force of will of the creator.$(br2)It may be smelted into ingots like all other ore.
This process is temporary, and the changes in magical energies may alter this process in the future.
